pageTitle: iTunes - Music - Secret Combination by Randy Crawford
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {19090=Randy Crawford made even more noise on the urban contemporary and R&B front in 1981 with this album, one of her most successful ever from a chart and hit standpoint. The title track and the album cut "Rio De Janeiro Blue" were well-received. She continued smartly blending jazzy pop, slick ballads, and earnest, anguished numbers like her cover of "Rainy Night In Georgia.", 118464=Copyright © 2014 Apple Inc. Tous droits réservés., 19608=Born: 18 February 1952 in Macon, GA}
